MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in   CH5 postcode area of Deeside, affecting properties in St. Ethelwolds Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:29PM. Our engineers are on site and have managed to restore supplies to a number of properties, they have confirmed there is a fault on the underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, due to repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:58PM on 8th March 2021
